Minifig290,"2018-09-23T15:00:24.653Z","This or Postcard? Obviously this","

Welcome all to my review
column2: of a New York Exclusive Magnet set, The New York Minifigure Magnet is exclusive to all LEGO Stores in the New York state and retails for $4.99 and has 6 pieces giving him a price per part. of 83c.

column1: The magnet is packaged in a plastic box with a cardboard backing. Let&rsquo
column2: s look at everything on offer.

column1: The minifigure included has a nice exclusive torso with &ldquo
column3: written but the o in york is a lego apple to represent the Big Apple, all that is printed onto a white torso with blue arms. His legs are fairly rare with the hip piece printed with a belt but the rest of the legs are plain white. His smiling face is a common print with just a smile, eyes and brown eyebrows also his hat is just a common blue cap.

column2: magnet obviously has a magnet but it isn&rsquo
column3: t a tacky one oh no, it&rsquo
column4: s a awesome hard to find red LEGO&nbsp
column5: magnet piece that is one mold that looks like a 2x4 brick with a a plate hanging out for the&nbsp
column6: figure to attach to. Attached to the front studs is the second exclusive part a 2x4 white tile with the New York skyline printed on in just black lines.

column2: d say that if you visit any of the NY LEGO Stores get this magnet&nbsp
column3: ,or the Statue of Liberty Magnet or the figure in this magnet but in key chain form, instead of a boring postcard. I wish all LEGO Stores had a exclusive magnet or keychain like New York and London Leicester Square. The 2 exclusive&nbsp
column4: prints are awesome and useful. It&rsquo
column5: s a nice thing to have on display as well.

column3: parts, neat little gift (better than a postcard)
